title: Mae Daeng Mangsawirat
description: Check with Mae Daeng to make sure she's open. She turned 70 in 2004 and has been running this restaurant for 10+ years. She cooks all the food and makes her own black sesame seed butter, which sells all around Thailand. The signage is small and easily missed, so look for it.
streetAddress: diagonally across from Reuan Tip Hotel on Paho
